selectedVerses.text: "You shall not delay to offer from the fullness of your harvest and from the outflow of your presses. The firstborn of your sons you shall give to me.
But I am poor and needy; hasten to me, O God! You are my help and my deliverer; O LORD, do not delay!
But he said to them, "Do not delay me, since the LORD has prospered my way. Send me away that I may go to my master."
if I delay, you may know how one ought to behave in the household of God, which is the church of the living God, a pillar and buttress of truth.
and swore by him who lives forever and ever, who created heaven and what is in it, the earth and what is in it, and the sea and what is in it, that there would be no more delay,
